algorithm_technique: Mathematical calculation using modulo arithmetic to determine the position in the back-and-forth movement.
problem_summary_simple: Find who has the pillow after a certain time, given people in a line passing it back and forth.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate the final position of the pillow by modeling its movement as a cycle and using modulo arithmetic.
key_insights: The pillow's movement is cyclical: it goes from 1 to n, then n to 1. This cycle length is 2 * (n - 1).
The modulo operator is key to finding the effective time within a single cycle.
The absolute difference from the 'peak' position (n) can determine the final position.
